document.full_text: dunkin' donuts stores open at least a year reported a 2.3% sales increase in the u.s., offsetting a 5.2% drop at baskin-robbins.
document.title: dunkin' brands u.s. donut shop sales offset drop at baskin-robbins
lines_and_colors: dunkin' donuts stores open at least a year reported a 2.3% sales increase in the u.s., offsetting a 5.2% drop at baskin-robbins.
